33458.summary: Some customers in British Columbia are experiencing an intermittent black screen when watching Chek TV.  We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
33458.title: Feb 11 - British Columbia | Chek TV - Intermittent Black Screen (Investigating)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.

Services are still disrupted as a BC Hydro outage affecting our equipment is ongoing. Our technicians are on standby if repair to our equipment is required when power is restored. We apologize for the extended disruption.
BC Hydro is working to restore power to the affected area and our equipment servicing the area. Services will begin to come online as power is restored.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
